description: Alameda County Housing and Community Development Department (HCD) runs the Mortgage Credit Certificate (MCC) Program.  A MCC provides the income-eligible first-time home buyer with an opportunity to reduce the amount of federal income tax they owe each year they own and live in their home. The MCC assists a family in qualifying for a higher first mortgage, with no effect on monthly expenses.
